verses.verse: Let as many <WG3745> servants <WG1401> as are <WG1526> under <WG5259> the yoke <WG2218> count <WG2233> their own <WG2398> masters <WG1203> worthy <WG514> of all <WG3956> honor, <WG5092> that <WG2443> the <WG3588> name <WG3686> of God <WG2316> and <WG2532> his doctrine <WG1319> be not <WG3361> blasphemed. <WG987>

And <WG1161> they that have <WG2192> believing <WG4103> masters, <WG1203> let them not <WG3361> despise <WG2706> them, because <WG3754> they are <WG1526> brethren; <WG80> but <WG235> rather <WG3123> do them service, <WG1398> because <WG3754> they are <WG1526> faithful <WG4103> and <WG2532> beloved, <WG27> partakers <WG482> of the <WG3588> benefit. <WG2108> These things <WG5023> teach <WG1321> and <WG2532> exhort. <WG3870>

If any man <WG1536> teach otherwise, <WG2085> and <WG2532> consent <WG4334> not <WG3361> to wholesome <WG5198> words, <WG3056> even the words <WG3588> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and <WG2532> to the <WG3588> doctrine <WG1319> which is according <WG2596> to godliness; <WG2150>

He is proud, <WG5187> knowing <WG1987> nothing, <WG3367> but <WG235> doting <WG3552> about <WG4012> questions <WG2214> and <WG2532> strifes of words, <WG3055> whereof <WG1537> <WG3739> cometh <WG1096> envy, <WG5355> strife, <WG2054> railings, <WG988> evil <WG4190> surmisings. <WG5283>

Perverse disputings <WG3859> of men <WG444> of corrupt <WG1311> minds, <WG3563> and <WG2532> destitute <WG650> of the <WG3588> truth, <WG225> supposing <WG3543> that gain <WG4200> is <WG1511> godliness: <WG2150> from <WG575> such <WG5108> withdraw thyself. <WG868>
But <WG1161> godliness <WG2150> with <WG3326> contentment <WG841> is <WG2076> great <WG3173> gain. <WG4200>
For <WG1063> we brought <WG1533> nothing <WG3762> into <WG1519> this world, <WG2889> and it is certain <WG1212> <WG3754> we <WG3761> can <WG1410> carry nothing out. <WG1627> <WG5100>
And <WG1161> having <WG2192> food <WG1305> and <WG2532> raiment <WG4629> let us be therewith content. <WG714> <WG5125>

But <WG1161> they that will <WG1014> be rich <WG4147> fall <WG1706> into <WG1519> temptation <WG3986> and <WG2532> a snare, <WG3803> and <WG2532> into many <WG4183> foolish <WG453> and <WG2532> hurtful <WG983> lusts, <WG1939> which <WG3748> drown <WG1036> men <WG444> in <WG1519> destruction <WG3639> and <WG2532> perdition. <WG684>

For <WG1063> the <WG3588> love of money <WG5365> is <WG2076> the root <WG4491> of all <WG3956> evil: <WG2556> which <WG3739> while some <WG5100> coveted after, <WG3713> they have erred <WG635> from <WG575> the <WG3588> faith, <WG4102> and <WG2532> pierced themselves through <WG4044> <WG1438> with many <WG4183> sorrows. <WG3601>

But <WG1161> thou, <WG4771> O <WG5599> man <WG444> of God, <WG2316> flee <WG5343> these things; <WG5023> and <WG1161> follow after <WG1377> righteousness, <WG1343> godliness, <WG2150> faith, <WG4102> love, <WG26> patience, <WG5281> meekness. <WG4236>

Fight <WG75> the <WG3588> good <WG2570> fight <WG73> of faith, <WG4102> lay hold on <WG1949> eternal <WG166> life, <WG2222> whereunto <WG1519> <WG3739> thou art also <WG2532> called, <WG2564> and <WG2532> hast professed <WG3670> a good <WG2570> profession <WG3671> before <WG1799> many <WG4183> witnesses. <WG3144>

I give thee charge <WG3853> <WG4671> in the sight <WG1799> of God, <WG2316> who quickeneth <WG2227> all things, <WG3956> and <WG2532> before Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> who before <WG1909> Pontius <WG4194> Pilate <WG4091> witnessed <WG3140> a good <WG2570> confession; <WG3671>

That thou <WG4571> keep <WG5083> this commandment <WG1785> without spot, <WG784> unrebukable, <WG423> until <WG3360> the <WG3588> appearing <WG2015> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

Which <WG3739> in his <WG2398> times <WG2540> he shall show, <WG1166> who is the <WG3588> blessed <WG3107> and <WG2532> only <WG3441> Potentate, <WG1413> the <WG3588> King <WG935> of kings, <WG936> and <WG2532> Lord <WG2962> of lords; <WG2961>

Who <WG3588> only <WG3441> hath <WG2192> immortality, <WG110> dwelling <WG3611> in the light <WG5457> which no man can approach unto; <WG676> whom <WG3739> no <WG3762> man <WG444> hath seen, <WG1492> nor <WG3761> can <WG1410> see: <WG1492> to whom <WG3739> be honor <WG5092> and <WG2532> power <WG2904> everlasting. <WG166> Amen. <WG281>

Charge <WG3853> them that are rich <WG4145> in <WG1722> this world, <WG3568> <WG165> that they be not highminded; <WG5309> <WG3361> nor <WG3366> trust <WG1679> in <WG1909> uncertain <WG83> riches, <WG4149> but <WG235> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> living <WG2198> God, <WG2316> who giveth <WG3930> us <WG2254> richly <WG4146> all things <WG3956> to <WG1519> enjoy; <WG619>
That they do good, <WG14> that they be rich <WG4147> in <WG1722> good <WG2570> works, <WG2041> <WG1511> ready to distribute, <WG2130> willing to communicate; <WG2843>

Laying up in store <WG597> for themselves <WG1438> a good <WG2570> foundation <WG2310> against <WG1519> the <WG3588> time to come, <WG3195> that <WG2443> they may lay hold on <WG1949> eternal <WG166> life. <WG2222>

O <WG5599> Timothy, <WG5095> keep <WG5442> that which is committed to thy trust, <WG3872> avoiding <WG1624> profane <WG952> and vain babblings, <WG2757> and <WG2532> oppositions <WG477> of science <WG1108> falsely so called: <WG5581>
Which <WG3739> some <WG5100> professing <WG1861> have erred <WG795> concerning <WG4012> the <WG3588> faith. <WG4102> Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> thee. <WG4675> Amen. <WG281>
